channel.title: Making Someone Admin,Mod,Owner Not Working?
channel.description:
This is what i do its all right but not working?
Step 1 go to charater file and turn player rights to 2 Step 2 Go to file save and then shut off screen (Not shuting the screen of dosent work) Step 3 compile and press enter when compiled then shut screen down Step 4 They log in and they aint a admin :confused:
i need remote assistance help just add footydefender@hotmail.co.uk (Remote assistance is when you use my mouse and go around on my pc and sort of do it for me but you will need msn 7.5 or higher or it wont work, Thanks.
[b]Edit[/b] At the moment im not here but please add me for when im back i will be really greatfull!

item.title: Making Someone Admin,Mod,Owner Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @BloodyRage BloodyRage
item.description:
@BloodyRage wrote:

Yeah, Make sure the person who you are making Admin, Mod Or Owner Is OFFLINE. Then Change it, Save it. And get them back on.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Someone Admin,Mod,Owner Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @NeFiz NeFiz
item.description:
@NeFiz wrote:

Open up client.java
hit CTRL + F search for //admin list, or search for /admin i don’t know for sure( that’s what i had to look for when i used testcape in the beginnning but i changed it to //admin maybe smart to do it to)
add to that list,

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 2; }
if it won’t work add me on msn viet.an@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Making Someone Admin,Mod,Owner Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:

[quote=“jonaske, post:2, topic:75197”]its so easy just go to ur character folder then openen ur name then change character rights = 0 into 1 2 or 3 save then close compile run and log in and i would work
else u have a bad source i think ( btw wich 1 have you)[/quote] He is using TestScape server source, and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Someone Admin,Mod,Owner Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Are you making sure the person you’re making Admin, Mod, or Owner/Co-Owner is Offline before you change their Rights? It only works when they are Offline, then you save it, then when they log back on their Rights are what you made them.

Read full topic
